keyword: how many calories are in tic tacs
title: How Many Calories Are in Tic Tacs?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in Tic Tacs per piece, including carbs, sugars, and full nutrition breakdown for mint lovers.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Tic Tacs?
assumptions: Standard Tic Tac mint (e.g., orange flavor), approximately 0.5 g per piece; no packaging or allergens considered.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, batch, and manufacturer; Tic Tacs are low-calorie but check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One Tic Tac contains about 2 calories, mostly from sugars.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories are in one Tic Tac?

faqs.a: Yes, each Tic Tac is only 2 kcal, making them a low-calorie breath mint.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Tic Tacs?
faqs.a: One Tic Tac has 0.5 g carbs, all from sugars, with 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: Do Tic Tacs have fat or protein?
faqs.a: No fat or protein; calories come primarily from sugars.

faqs.q: How many Tic Tacs in a serving?
faqs.a: A typical serving is 3-4 pieces, about 6-8 calories total.
